name: v5.1.13
body:

* fix: trigger lingo.dev by removing duplicate value by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20475
* chore: update status code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20443

name: v5.1.11
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: atoms build inferred types by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20409
* fix: system booking field is not translated in calendar event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20410
* chore: small changes to referral embed by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20419
* feat: Prevent watchlisted entities from creating bookings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19107
* fix: Flaky organization.spec.ts test for i.cal.com by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20421
* fix: 500 error on missing response id. Should be 400 by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20420
* refactor: v2 team event type assignAllTeamMembers by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20400
* feat: Salesforce - Fallback to Lead if Contact Isn't Found For Routing by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20423
* fix: Dsync group table formatting by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20422
* chore: [Snyk] Security upgrade next from 13.5.7 to 13.5.9 by @pumfleet in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20412
* chore: Move CRM owner calls `handleResponse` by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19316
* fix: wrong dates on OOO due to summer time by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20408
* fix: Follow Up for dub referrral embed by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20427
* chore: Upgrade lingo.dev by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20430
* fix: add checkAdminOrOwner by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20429


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.10...v5.1.11

name: v5.1.10
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: Add assignment reason for round robin reassignments by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19199
* fix: adds scroll indicators and constain width on edit sheet by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20383

* fix: #11378 by @manurana26770 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20384
* refactor: platform - remove host and attendee automatic no show webhook trigger by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20385
* fix: circular dependencies by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20378
* fix: update error handling in validateBookingTimeIsNotOutOfBounds by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20386
* feat: dub refer embed by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20258
* fix: allow promotion codes by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20387
* fix: support Stripe subscription items by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20389
* perf: Remove ssrInit from layout and event-types by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20368
* fix: Prevent unnecessary delay in embed loading and prevents embed not loading for some users. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20373
* chore: decouple ui dialog from AppRouter and Atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20088
* fix: attribute filters on organization member list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20380
* chore: Use fixed mintlify version for builds by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20402
* fix: style DataTableSelectionBar by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20403
* feat: Toggle to hide Team Profile link on Booker by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20369
* fix: Stop throwing 202 for stripe handler by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20397
* fix: Restore `event name` field in Advanced Event Settings for Atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20394
* fix: Wrong bookerUrl for event-type preview link by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20399
* fix: Add 'await' to searchParams, parse failed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20407
* fix: Salesforce ownership query by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20405

## New Contributors
* @manurana26770 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20384

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.9...v5.1.10

name: v5.1.8
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: Introduce a new prop in the session to extract the profile username when inside an org by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18979

* fix: relative URL is being used where an absolute URL is required by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20314

* chore: move ServerTrans to packages/lib by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20353
* fix: remove oAuth clientId from email when rescheduling platform booking by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20354
* feat: upgrade @daily libs by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20348
* fix: skip when browsing month has no available slots by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19626
* fix: fixed onboarding steps with consistent loading state and button component by @ayush110404 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20350
* chore: set daily video testing link to env var by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20359
* fix: Buffers when combined with seated events by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20233
* docs: Fix quickstart link by @0xIvan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20355
* fix: some translations got wrong closing tags by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20360
* chore: better korean translations by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20362

## New Contributors

* perf: fix circular dependencies by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20121

name: v5.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: Use Watchlist on sending email verifications by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20114
* perf: Slim down loggedInViewer tRPC router by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20111
* fix: atoms making requests to customers' domains by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20084
* perf: Remove slots router from publicViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20128
* perf: Move apps procedures off of loggedInViewer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20112
* refactor: Delete dead code that is not safe to use by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20141
* chore: stringify body for request interceptor/middleware by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20131
* fix: Salesforce Stricter Website querying to prevent wrong account match during contact owner check by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20133
* fix: don't remind platform users in reminder cron by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20056
* chore: create org membership should be an upsert apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20129
* fix: Salesforce - fallback to creating lead by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20137
* feat: v2 api phone based organization team event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20134
* fix: UID cookie isn't accessible/created when in embed as it is third party context. by @gopoto in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859
* test: Add tests for Booker component by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19051
* fix: prevent auto accepting emails for platform orgs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20125
* fix: flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20168
* fix: spacing by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20172
* chore: Add logging to Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20167
* fix: sms formatting by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18647
* perf: Remove QueryCell usage in availability view by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20176
* fix: eslint error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20127
* fix: add documentation to the possible values of :app in conferencing controller by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20164

## New Contributors
* @gopoto made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19859

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.0...v5.1.1

name: v5.0.20
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20074
* fix: client export warning by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20077
* fix: flaky test in ooo e2e by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20073
* fix: synced no-show state after mutation by @parteekmalik in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20015
* fix: delegation credential not found by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20055
* perf: fix paths in tailwind preset + ignore node modules in Platform tailwind config by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20067

* fix: adjust table height on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19662
* fix: Private links in orgs when profile username isnt cal.com username by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19667

* refactor: import UseIsPlatform directly instead of barrel file by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19670

* fix: UI on mobile by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19673
* fix: use portal for DataTableSelectionBar by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19672

## What's Changed
* fix: v2 managed user attendee bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19612
* fix: added zoom, msTeams as valid locations in event-type, booker atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19599
* revert: country code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19618
* chore: migrate OG image generation API to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19568
* fix: hubSpot doesn't work for paid team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19609
* chore: migrate /org and /team embed pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19148
* fix: remove onboarding check for platform account creation by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19449
* fix: Change the origin to WEBAPP_URL for routing from event redirect URL by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19593
* chore: moved /help to github.com/calcom/help by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19554
* chore: update platform docs for teams setup by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19619
* feat: Task createCRMEvent can retry at cutomizable fixed interval by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19571
* fix: update profile instead of username. Display p.username by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19621
* fix: few ui issues by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19625
* feat: plain-thread-tier by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19463


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.8...v5.0.9

name: v5.0.8
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: ics compat with older ical specced calendars by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19582
* perf: do not import from `@calcom/lib/server` barrel file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19579
* feat: eleven labs app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19585
* fix: add flex-wrap to fix overflow by @scarlachs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584
* fix: two items in one row in profile  by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19602
* perf: Do not import Stripe lib in `getServerErrorFromUnknown` by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19578
* fix: updating attributes doesn't happen in real-time by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19604
* fix: remove wrong conditions to fetch users on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19580
* perf: Remove PlainChat from pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19588
* fix: Valid timeslot marked 'slot no longer available' by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19590
* perf: dynamically import sentry lib in error catch clause by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19607

## New Contributors
* @scarlachs made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.7...v5.0.8

name: v5.0.7
body:
## What's Changed
* perf: cache app store imports by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19519
* perf: run `ssrInit()` at root layout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19460
* chore: migrate `/api/avatar/[uuid]` to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19514
* fix: Encode usernames in booking url to UTF-8 to prevent 500 throws by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19475
* chore: pr-template updates to include demonstrations by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19533
* fix: No option to install/disconnect app from app detail page by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17997
* fix: Attempted to call ZFormsInputSchema() from the server by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19540
* feat: v2 managed organizations by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19341
* fix: disable skip confirm for booker_layout=WEEK_VIEW by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19524
* fix: refactor filter UIs on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19532
* chore: remove not used code related to filters on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19450
* fix: some ui fixes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19558
* chore: migrate /user embed pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19149
* feat: Manage Team ooo or crud by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16456
* fix: old v2 booking cancel endpoint issue by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19564
* fix: apply routing form filter by default on /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19535
* chore: small ooo translation fixes by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19569
* feat: Introduce a 'slot no longer available' message  by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18935
* refactor: platform default event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19225
* feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19576
* fix: time slot doesn't get selected in email embed by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19523
* test: Salesforce CRM - Add user facing tests and more logs by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19531
* feat: booker atom prevent event type success redirect by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19573
* fix: phone input and week view missing styles atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19581
* feat: support attendee name and email filter on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19565


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.6...v5.0.7

name: v5.0.6
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: block POST requests to invalid routes in middleware intentionally by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19446

* fix: display error msg when end date not selected by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19485
* fix: typos in packages/app-store by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19470
* feat: extract bottom navigation logic into a custom hook by @ddoemonn in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19468
* revert: default people filter at bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19486

* fix: replace filter implementations on bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19445
* fix: Fix for 'Scheduling by cal.com' is still showing in workflow emails even when branding is disabled by @sn10-debug in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18862
* perf: improve matching paths in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19491
* revert: "fix: replace filter implementations on bookings (#19445)" by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19506

## New Contributors

name: v5.0.5
body:

* fix: Routing Form - Crash due to an invalid state of connected field that was deleted in main form by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19421

* feat: display alert when leaving/reloading booking page by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18932
* fix: booking fields being overridden whenever saving with atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19339
* refactor: Enabling typescript 5.3.3 in @calcom/trpc by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19394
